description: The file defines the Android activity 'HomeActivity' for the Android TV frontend. It includes setup for the top menu bar and multiple horizontal content rails, each with placeholder poster data, utilizing RecyclerView adapters. The file also contains the 'Poster' data class and 'PosterAdapter' class for rendering posters in horizontal lists.

classes.name: Poster
classes.description: A simple data class representing a poster with an ID.

classes.name: PosterAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Poster items in a horizontal list.

classes.name: PosterViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder for PosterAdapter, wrapping a poster item view.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, setting up the UI components and their interactions.

methods.name: setupTopMenu
methods.description: Configures the top menu buttons and their click actions, including navigation to LoginActivity.

methods.name: setupRails
methods.description: Configures and populates the horizontal content rails with placeholder poster data.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the poster item view for each poster in the adapter.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the view holder; in this placeholder, it only makes views focusable.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of posters to display.
